headline: Macario penalties see Chelsea Women top UWCL group
summary: Chelsea won their UEFA Women’s Champions League group when coming from behind to claim a 2-1 victory away to Real Madrid. Group A: Lyon 1-0 Wolfsburg, Roma 3-0 Galatasaray  Group B: Real Madrid 1-2 Chelsea, […]

headline: Subway Women’s League Cup set for Manchester derby
summary: Manchester United and Manchester City to meet in the quarter-finals of the newly titled Subway Women’s League Cup. There is an all-capital clash between Spurs and West Ham, Brighton host Arsenal, while sole Championship survivors […]

headline: First win for Everton over Man City in Women’s Super League
summary: Everton took Barclays Women’s Super League points off Manchester City for the first time at the 17th attempt to secure a second win of the season. Everton 2-1 Manchester City Aston Villa 3-1 West Ham […]

headline: Brighton Women peg back Spurs for 1-1 draw
summary: Fifth-placed Brighton stayed six points ahead of Spurs in the Barclays Women’s Super League after equalising to draw with their visitors. After a first half of very few goal threats, Brighton goalkeeper kept out a […]

headline: Leicester City Women end Chelsea’s perfect form
summary: Leicester City ended Chelsea’s 100% record in the Barclays Women’s Super League as the leaders had to settle for a point. The Foxes lost Deanne Rose to injury in only the 10th minute, Guro Reiten […]

headline: Last Barclays Women’s Super League games for five weeks
summary: This weekend brings the last Barclays WSL and Championship games before both competitions resume in the second half of January 2025. Chelsea look to extend their perfect start to a tenth match when away to […]

headline: Man City Women’s UWCL victory marred by Greenwood injury
summary: Manchester City extended their perfect record in the UEFA Women’s Champions League group stage to a fifth matchday, while Arsenal made it four wins in five. Group C: Bayern Munich 4-0 Juventus, Vålerenga 1-3 Arsenal […]

headline: Six-goal Chelsea Women record fifth straight UWCL win
summary: Chelsea and Lyon both continued their perfect form in the UEFA Women’s Champions League group stage while Wolfsburg secured their quarter-final place. Group A: Galatasaray 0-6 Lyon, Wolfsburg 6-1 Roma Wolfsburg hit Roma 6-1 to […]

headline: Man Utd eventually see off Newcastle 5-3 in Women’s League Cup
summary: Brighton, Durham, Manchester United, Spurs and West Ham progress to the Women’s League Cup last eight, joining Arsenal, Chelsea and Man City. GROUP A: Liverpool 4-0 Everton, Manchester United 5-3 Newcastle United Hannah Greenwood conceded an […]

headline: UWCL and Women’s League Cup midweek matches
summary: The penultimate round of UWCL group stages games are being played this midweek, as are the last matches in the Women’s League Cup sections. Chelsea chase a fifth straight win in the Champions League when […]
